gurmukhi: pUjIAY n sIsu eIsu aUcO dyhI mY khwvY pUjIAY n locn diRsit diRstwNq kY
transliteration: Poojeeai N Seesu Eesu Oochau Dayhee Mai Kahaavai , Poojeeai N Lochan Drisati Drisataant Kai ?
translation: Head is located above all other parts of the body but is not worshipped. Nor are eyes worshipped which see far in the distance.

gurmukhi: pUjIAY n sÍn duriq snbMD kir pUjIAY n nwskw subws sÍws kRwNq kY
transliteration: Poojeeai N Sravan Durati Sanabandh Kari , Poojeeai N Naasakaa Soubaas Svaas Kraant Kai ?
translation: Ears are not worshipped for their power of hearing nor nostrils for their ability to smell and breathe.

gurmukhi: pUjIAY n muK sÍwd sbd sMjugq kY pUjIAY n hsq skl AMg pwNq kY
transliteration: Poojeeai N Moukh Svaad Sabad Sanjougat Kai , Poojeeai N Hasat Sakal Ang Paant Kai ?
translation: Mouth which enjoys all the tastes and make speech, is not worshipped nor the hands which nourish all other limbs.

gurmukhi: diRsit sbd suriq gMD rs rihq huie pUjIAY pdwribMd nvn mhwNq kY ]289]
transliteration: Drisati Sabad Surati Gandh Ras Rahit Hui , Poojeeai Padaarabind Navan Mahaant Kai ?289?
translation: Feet which are devoid of ability to see, talk, hear, smell or taste are worshipped for their traits of humility. (289)
